parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Map

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Draw a line on the map. Can decrease framerate!

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> map '''drawLine''' [position1, position2, color]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> map: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [position1, position2, color]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> position1: [[Position2D]], [[Position3D]], [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> position2: [[Position2D]], [[Position3D]], [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> color: [[Color|Color (RGBA)]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>([[findDisplay]] 12 [[displayCtrl]] 51) [[ctrlAddEventHandler]] ["Draw","
	(_this [[select]] 0) [[drawLine]] [
		[[getPos]] [[player]],
		[0,0,0],
		[0,0,1,1]
	];
"];</code>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[drawArrow]], [[drawEllipse]], [[drawIcon]], [[drawRectangle]], [[drawPolygon]], [[drawTriangle]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
